syntax_editor_macro.comments: This template creates the code necessary to access the AppBuilderAddTestToSuite() function contained in the AppBuilderAddTestToSuite script include.
syntax_editor_macro.name: AppBuilderAddTestToSuite
syntax_editor_macro.text: var AppBuilderAddTestToSuite = x_snc_devtools.AppBuilderAddTestToSuite; AppBuilderAddTestToSuite('4a8550391b5b8850a89720a8ec4bcbd9'); // Add a new test to the "DevTools" test suite
